bug.author: aiqu
bug.description:
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/README.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/README.md</denchmark-link>
...In addition to the types of scope mechanisms in TensorFlow (name_scope, variable_scope, TF-Slim adds a...
Link of variable_scope ( <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/state_layers#variable_scope>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/state_layers#variable_scope</denchmark-link> ) is broken.
